oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wirkung von Biochar und organischen Düngern auf Pflanzenwachstum und Bodeneigenschaften
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Reents, Hans Jürgen
Levin, Kain
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soil quality
Soil
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The effects of Biochar and combinations with organic manures on plant biomass and soil properties were tested in a lab experiment with two different soils. Highest applications (10%) of Biochar alone implicated a plant growth decrease while the manure combinations increased biomass, especially in the Luvisol. This positive reaction was not detected in the Regosol during the experiment. Increasing rates of the different amendments decreased soil bulk density, especially in the Luvisol. Manures increased soil respiration, Biochar had nearly no effect. In order to improve soil fertility, combining Biochar with organic N-fertiliser is recommended.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Reents, Hans Jürgen and Levin, Kain (2013) Wirkung von Biochar und organischen Düngern auf Pflanzenwachstum und Bodeneigenschaften. Paper at: 12. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Rheinische Friedrich-Wilhelms-Universität, Bonn, 5. bis 8. März 2013.
